en-US.name: Key Signatures
en-US.summary: The key signature tests will help you learn the number of sharps and flats belonging to each key.
en-US.description: There are three variations of this test. For a given key you will be asked to say how many sharps or flats it contains. Given the number of sharps or flats yo will be asked to name the key
examplePhrases: Alexa, buy key signatures Or Alexa, playkey signatures

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The key signatures gives three variations of tests
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing key signatures. You now have access to the key signature tests!
